name: Death's Toll
description:
Fight & scavenge, gather powerups to survive, and don't waste a step, for with every wasted moment, a terrifying beast draws closer, ready to reap your soul. Go alone or with a buddy as you roadtrip across a dangerous, randomly-generated world.

  • A THRILLING, DIFFICULT, ROGUELITE, ROADTRIP ADVENTURE

    Death's Toll takes you on a randomly-generated journey across a dangerous world filled with colorful characters. The game heavily focuses on the constant threat presented by the always-following beast. Sleep will be limited, supplies will need to be gathered and used sparingly, and along the way, expect to meet a plethora of really strange NPC's.



  • YOUR PATH IS YOUR OWN

    Every adventure begins with a randomly generated map for you to traverse through. Pick which spots you want to visit and learn what may await behind each icon!



  • FIGHT, SCAVENGE, AND KEEP MOVING

    A variety of enemies stand in your path, just as you have a variety of classes to choose from. Pick your fighting style and use it to push forward, picking up food, drinks, and powerups along the way!



  • MAKE TOUGH CHOICES

    Every good adventure has some roadblocks- some a little dumber than others...



  • MEET TOTAL WEIRDOS

    There's no shortage of odd characters to meet... NPC's can be found in abundance. Your own character gets a personality of your choosing! From Hero to Vigilante, Wild Card to Menace, there's hundreds of unique lines to find.



  • VENDING MACHINE

    vending machine


And hey buddy... we got a LOT more vending machines where that came from.
